name: FinishMyGames
description:
In this game you are a level designer. Your task is to finish rushed games so that players can play them.

You manipulate the levels from the outside before you launch the game. You can also edit the levels post launch. Sometimes it's even necessary to get the 5 required players to the goal. 

Every time you edit the game post launch the version number goes up. Try to keep it as low as possoble.

Note: This game was accutually kinda rushed. Couldn't work with the game after wedensday, som this game was made between sunday 14/10/18 and sunday 14/10/18. Because of this the game mas many flaws.

Also, i did not have time to compose any music for this game so i unfortunately had to use one of my previous tracks;

Remains - from my other game: Alpha Contact

https://gamejolt.com/games/Alphac/354302

Hope you can still enjoy the game (ﾟヮﾟ)
